data.title: Hiten Tejwani’s Biography | Birth | Education | Family | Marriage | Debut | TV Serials | Films
meta_keywords: gauri pradhan tejwani date of birth
hiten tejwani first wife reena thapar kapoor
hiten tejwani movies and tv shows
data.meta_description: Hiten Tejwani is an Indian television actor. Hiten gained immense recognition for his role in the TV show ‘Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi.’ He won the Indian Telly Award and Indian Television Academy Award for Best Actor for the same show.
data.text:
Hiten Tejwani is an Indian television actor. He was born on 5 March 1974 in Mumbai, Maharashtra. His zodiac sign is Pisces. He completed his schooling from St Francis D’Assisi High School, Mumbai. He earned a degree from Jai Hind College, Mumbai.

His father, Jethanand Bhojraj is a businessman. His mother, Asha is a homemaker. He has two brothers, Nitin and Hitesh.

He is married to Gauri Pradhan Tejwani. They have a son, Nevaan Tejwani, and a daughter, Katya Tejwani.

Hiten’s favourites

His hobbies include watching films and reading books.

His favourite actors are Richard Gray, Tom Cruise, Amitabh Bachchan, Shah Rukh Khan, and Kajol.

His favourite films are, Black, and Life is Beautiful.

His favourite colour is black.

His favourite book is ‘If Tomorrow Comes’ by Sidney Sheldon.

His favourite travelling destination is Goa.

Interesting facts about Hiten Tejwani

Hiten started his career as an assistant director and an editor.

He has featured in several commercials and advertisements like, Close Up and TVS Scooty.

Hiten made his acting debut with the role of ‘Gautam’ in the 2000 TV serial ‘Ghar Ek Mandir.’

Hiten’s major role

Hiten gained immense recognition for his role in the TV show ‘Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi.’ He won the Indian Telly Award and Indian Television Academy Award for Best Actor for the same show.

He participated in several reality shows with his partner Gauri Pradhan Tejwani, such as ‘Nach Baliye Season 2’ (2006), ‘Kabhi Kabhi Pyaar Kabhi Kabhi Yaar’ (2008), ‘Jodi Kammal Ki’ (2005) and ‘Are You Faster Than Panchvi Pass’ (2008).

Hiten has played several characters with the name ‘Karan’ in the TV shows.

In 2017, he participated as a contestant in the famous reality show ‘Bigg Boss Season 11.’

Hiten’s projects

Some of Hiten Tejwani’s popular shows are, Kutumb (2001), Pavitra Rishta (2009), Gangaa (2015), Kaisa Ye Pyar Hai (2005), Miit (2003), Kasautii Zindagi Kay (2001), and Meri Aashiqui Tumse Hi (2014).

Hiten has worked in a few Bollywood films like, Jogi (2022), Shorgul (2016), Saansein (2016), Krishna Cottage (2004), Ardh (2022), and Zindagi Shatranj Hai (2023).
